news.title: Upcoming album Pomes Penyeach to showcase the poems of James Joyce
news.summary: Listen to the first track from the album below.

news.title: Ozzy Osbourne biopic is reportedly in the works
news.summary: The film has not been officially approved yet but could hit cinemas in the summer of 2027

news.title: WATCH: Filmmakers share new teaser clip for Spinal Tap II
news.summary: The sequel to the 1984 mockumentary This is Spinal Tap is set for Irish cinema release on September 12.

news.title: Pearl Jam drummer Matt Cameron steps down from band
news.summary: "It’s been an incredible journey," Cameron said.

news.title: Live Report: Mumford & Sons illuminate Malahide Castle with unending buoyancy
news.summary: English folk icons Mumford & Sons took over the grounds of Malahide Castle on Friday for a night of pure, unaltered joy, including a special performance with Lisa Hannigan.

news.title: Yasmin Zaher: “When you come  from a situation where your life is already unstable and risky, you’re going to search for a profession that can give you more stability"
news.summary: Yasmin Zaher discusses her Dylan Thomas Prize-winning debut novel The Coin, which focuses on a Palestinian woman living in New York, who becomes entangled in the city’s luxury goods black market.

news.title: Comedian Reginald D. Hunter appears in London court over social media posts
news.summary: The UK-based comedian who frequently tours Ireland faces private prosecution from a British organization.

news.title: Live Report: Sunday at Longitude 2025 – a rain-soaked rave and a legendary finale
news.summary: Aran Sheehy brings us all the action from Day 2 of Longitude – featuring 50 Cent, blk., Hannah Laing, Sonny Fodera and more.
